svg.text: HP NonStop (Tandem) — Failure Sequence & Recovery Flow
✓ NORMAL STATE — All subsystems redundant & online
PHASE 2 — DISK SUBSYSTEM FAILURE (MID BILLING CYCLE)
Storage subsystem disk fails during active billing cycle
Process pairs did not fail over
Pathway Servers | Guardians | TMF | SQL/MP | SQL/MX | ENSCRIBE | App Processes
All launched in coordinated parallel waves per standard runbook
↓ FAILED — dependency race conditions & false-ready states
⚠ Last occurrence: 15+ years ago — No institutional knowledge on current team
PHASE 6 — SYSTEM ONLINE BUT FINANCIALLY INCONSISTENT
System Online — TMF Recovery Ran — GAP DETECTED
TMF could not fully recover all in-flight transactions from audit trails
System green ✓ | Dashboards normal ✓ | Financial state INCONSISTENT ✗
Transactional atomicity held — Cycle-level atomicity broken
→ DECISION FORK: MTTR vs. Financial Integrity
TMF = Transaction Monitoring Facility | SQL/MP = Tandem SQL | ENSCRIBE = Tandem native file system | Pathway = TP monitor
